author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman and a youth were killed in a road accident near here on Friday.

Samikkannu’s daughter Mallika (36) and adopted son Suresh Kumar (31) were returning home at Mathur when a van hit them killing them on the spot. Tiruvaiyaru police said T. Manikandan of Thiruchotruthurai who was on the wheel was nursing a grudge against the deceased. Search is on for Manikandan. — Special Correspondent
title: Two killed
